strings.LOCKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Only spawns when a survivor holds the common item "Rusty Key" and will always contain an uncommon or legendary item.
strings.LOCKBOXVOID_DESCRIPTION: Only spawns when a survivor holds the void item "Encrusted Key" and will drop a Void Potential item.
strings.EQUPMENTBARREL_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to open and will always contain an equipment item.
strings.CHEST1_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to open and has a chance to contain either a common, uncommon, or legendary item.
strings.CHEST1_STEALTHED_DESCRIPTION: An invisible chest that does not have to be purchased. The Cloaked Chest has a chance to contain either a common, uncommon, or legendary item.
strings.CHEST2_DESCRIPTION: Pricier Chest than the Small Chest that contains an item of at least uncommon rarity and has a higher chance to hold a legendary item.
strings.GOLDCHEST_DESCRIPTION: Expensive chest guaranteed to hold a legendary item. Natural generation is extremely rare.
strings.TIMEDCHEST_DESCRIPTION: A timed chest that will only open if a survivor reaches it before the 10 minute mark.
strings.RADIOTOWER_DESCRIPTION: Scans the entire stage on activation and adds the environmental data of the scanned stage to the survivor's Logbook.
strings.FAN_DESCRIPTION: Turns into a launch pad after activation to launch survivors to other locations on the stage.
strings.DUPLICATOR_DESCRIPTION: Allows survivors to print a common or uncommon item if they sacrifice a scrap or a random item matching the displayed item's rarity. The 3D printer will always take scrap before a random item.
strings.DUPLICATOR_MILITARY_DESCRIPTION: The rarest printer that allows survivors to print legendary items if they sacrifice a legendary scrap or a random legendary item. The 3D printer will always take scrap before a random item.
strings.DUPLICATOR_WILD_DESCRIPTION: Allows survivors to print a boss item if they sacrifice a boss scrap or a random boss item. The 3D printer will always take scrap before a random item.
strings.CASINOCHEST_CONTEXT: stop it to get what you want
strings.CASINOCHEST_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to activate and will cycle through many items quickly. Interacting with the Adaptive Chest will drop the item currently displayed in the cycle.
strings.LUNAR_CHEST_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 Lunar coin and drops a random Lunar Item or Lunar Equipment.
strings.LUNAR_TERMINAL_DESCRIPTION: Offers 1 Lunar Item each in exchange for 2 Lunar Coins. Only Lunar Items that have already been unlocked will appear.
strings.LUNAR_REROLL_DESCRIPTION: Allows survivors to reroll all the remaining Lunar Buds in the lunar shop.
strings.BAZAAR_CAULDRON_DESCRIPTION: Allows survivors to exchange multiple common items or scrap for a random uncommon or legendary item.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_DESCRIPTION: Guarantees the next stage's environment is the environment displayed.
strings.NEWT_STATUE_DESCRIPTION: Costs one Lunar Coin to activate and will spawn a blue portal after the Teleporter Event allowing the player to travel to the Bazaar Between Time.
strings.CATEGORYCHEST_HEALING_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to open and will contain either a common, uncommon or legendary healing item.
strings.CATEGORYCHEST_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to open and will contain either a common, uncommon or legendary damage item.
strings.CATEGORYCHEST_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to open and will contain either a common, uncommon or legendary utility item.
strings.SHRINE_HEALING_USE_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine>they don't know the tree is giving you the succ</color>
strings.SHRINE_HEALING_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor the Shrine of the Woods will create a circular field around it that heals all allies when inside it.
strings.SHRINE_BLOOD_USE_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine>you crush your cock with a rock for {1} gold</color>
strings.SHRINE_BLOOD_USE_MESSAGE: <style=cShrine>{0} crushes their cock with a rock and gains {1} gold</color>
strings.SHRINE_BLOOD_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor the Shrine of Blood consumes a percentage of the survivors health in exchange for gold equal to half the amount of HP taken.
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine>you donate to the stream and she says your name</color>
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: <style=cShrine>{0} donated to the stream and she said their name</color>
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_FAIL_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine>you donate, but she doesnt say your name :(</color>
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_FAIL_MESSAGE: <style=cShrine>{0} donated, but she didnt say their name</color>
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor the Shrine of Chance has a chance to drop an item of random rarity or a random equipment item.
strings.SHRINE_BOSS_CONTEXT: hit me if you arent a coward
strings.SHRINE_BOSS_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor the Teleporter Event will increase in difficulty and extra items will be given once the survivors kill all the Teleporter bosses.
strings.SHRINE_RESTACK_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor the Shrine of Order randomly selects an item from each tier of rarity and turns all items of the same rarity into the selected item of that tier.
strings.SHRINE_GOLDSHORES_CONTEXT: lots of money for a big frend chance
strings.SHRINE_GOLDSHORES_DESCRIPTION: A rare and expensive shrine that will spawn a Gold Portal once the Teleporter Event has finished, allowing the player to travel to the Gilded Coast.
strings.SHRINE_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor a group of enemies already found in the stage will spawn around the Shrine of Combat.
strings.SHRINE_CLEANSE_DESCRIPTION: Allows survivors to sacrifice a random Lunar item or Lunar Equipment in exchange for a Pearl item.
strings.GOLDTOTEM_DESCRIPTION: When activated by a survivor beacon is restored to reveal the mysteries of the Gilded Coast.
strings.VENDING_MACHINE_CONTEXT: purchase a refreshing mug root beer
strings.LOCKEDMADE_DESCRIPTION: A being trapped in time. They can be freed, for a price.
strings.SCAVBACKPACK_DESCRIPTION: Contains 10 items with the chance to be either a common, uncommon, or legendary item.
strings.DRONE_GUNNER_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance shooting nearby targets.
strings.DRONE_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance shooting or launching missiles at nearby targets. It is more durable, deals more damage, and is more expensive than both the Gunner and Missile drones.
strings.DRONE_HEALING_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance, healing them and close allies. Can only heal one target at a time.
strings.DRONE_MISSILE_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance launching missiles at nearby targets.
strings.EQUIPMENTDRONE_DESCRIPTION: A companion that requires the player's current equipment to function and will follow the survivor at a close distance and uses the equipment item on nearby enemies.
strings.FLAMEDRONE_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance and moves towards nearby targets and burns them.
strings.EMERGENCYDRONE_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance, healing them and close allies. Can heal multiple targets at once. It is more durable, can heal more rapidly and is more expensive than the healing drone.
strings.TURRET1_DESCRIPTION: A stationary companion bought with gold that shoots at nearby targets. It is more powerful than the Gunner drone.
strings.PICKUP_LUNAR_COIN_DESCRIPTION: A <sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1>Lunar Coin. Radiates a mysterious energy. Used as currency.
strings.SCRAPPER_DESCRIPTION: Allows survivors to sacrifice items in exchange for pieces of scrap the same rarity as the sacrificed item.
strings.VOIDLOCKBOX_CONTEXT: wtf asningnob and par ikd doing they dry
strings.VOIDLOCKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Only spawns when a survivor holds the void item "Encrusted Key" and will drop a Void Potential item.
strings.VOID_CHEST_DESCRIPTION: Consumes 50% of the survivor's HP and will spawn 1 void item and release up to 4 Void Infestors.
strings.VOID_TRIPLE_DESCRIPTION: Consumes 50% of the survivor's HP and will generate a Void Potential Orb.
strings.CATEGORYCHEST2_HEALING_DESCRIPTION: Pricier, rarer Chest than the Small Healing Chest. Contains an item of at least uncommon rarity and has a higher chance to hold a legendary healing item.
strings.CATEGORYCHEST2_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Pricier, rarer Chest than the Small Damage Chest. Contains an item of at least uncommon rarity and has a higher chance to hold a legendary damage item.
strings.CATEGORYCHEST2_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION: Pricier, rarer Chest than the Small Utility Chest. Contains an item of at least uncommon rarity and has a higher chance to hold a legendary utility item.
